author: jgoodyear
msg: [KARAF-146] osgi:list should only print out 'system' bundles above a certain level, by default, this should be 50, but it should be configurable /n Thanks Adrian Trenaman for the original patch :)

author: simonetripodi
msg: upgrated commons.release.version to 2.1, preparing the pom for 2.1-RC1 release

author: scottbw
msg: Modified the parser to model the Author as a localizable object with an optional its:dir property - see WOOKIE-119. This also affects the API the parser exposes to the Wookie server. I haven't changed the model managed by the server itself however, only the classes that map from the parser model to beans used by the server (WidgetFactory, GadgetAdaptor).
